game.name: Jungle War
game.description:
Hey boys! No need to show mercy on your enemies if you want to become the king of the jungle world. Are you ready to clear the area from the dangerous enemies by showing off your strong moves? Join Jungle War game and get ready to destroy all the pirates who have already seized the island! Do not worry at all since you would have the needful weapons to face off those dangerous bad souls! Try to be resourceful and heartless to survive the Jungle War in this brand new adventure game!

Do not forget to grab the diamonds to clear all levels while looking forward to shoot your enemies. These coins or diamonds will help you to revive your life and upgrade your weapons like the advanced machine guns. Trusting on anyone can bring your life into danger in this side-scrolling thriller. Keep your eyes on the blood-thirsty zombies, swarms of monsters, explosive crates, and, of course, bottomless pits in this html5 platform game! There are higher chances of becoming the next victim of the jungle in case if you have got late in pulling the trigger. 

Be prepared and blast your way out like a true action hero! Start your thrilling adventure challenge with a handgun, but after putting some good efforts, you will be able to get the command over some well-performed upgrades. Make sure to keep your eyes on the gems while gearing up for your enemies. Try to shoot your enemies first before asking any questions in this first-person shooter challenge! All the best to win this dangerous jungle war! Check out more addictive platformer games for boys that are available to play, no download required!

game.metaDesc: Play the online free game Jungle War at atmegame.com ! We have selected this Platform games for best excitement and thrill in you!

game.mobileControlKeys: L-ICONS TO MOVE,R- ICONS TO FIRE AND JUMP
game.webControlKeys: L-R ARROWS TO MOVE, UP ARROW TO JUMP, SPACE-SHOOT
